GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

exampleRequest.description: the world's leading expert in web development, 2043

topic.description: the world's leading expert in web development, 2043

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

exampleRequest.title: I don't always lurk
exampleRequest.body: Of course, I'd make you believe that. But the truth is indeed as your gut instinct says...

article.title: I don't always lurk
article.author: lurker
article.body: Of course, I'd make you believe that. But the truth is indeed as your gut instinct says...

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article by its id

exampleResponse.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
exampleResponse.author: icellusedkars

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves all the comments of an article

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: adds a comment for an article

exampleRequest.body: Does look like Mitch! Maybe Mitch is an immortal vampire, living among us from ages old ~

comment.body: Does look like Mitch! Maybe Mitch is an immortal vampire, living among us from ages old ~
comment.author: lurker

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: updates an article by article id

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes a comment by its id

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: updates the votes on a comment by comment id

comment.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!
comment.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/users/:username.description: returns a user object by username
